name: kilinkpro
0:
”Alexa,turn on light”
”Alexa,set curtain sixty percent”
”Alexa, set air conditioner speed to 4”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Kilink pro is an intelligent device management app independently developed by konka group. At present, kilink is connected with lights, curtains, air conditioners, air purifiers, sweeper robots and other devices.
